trans-unit.source: dotnet-build
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build

trans-unit.source: dotnet-build
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: dotnet-build
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build

trans-unit.source: NAME
trans-unit.target: NAME

trans-unit.source: dotnet-build -- Builds a project and all of its dependencies
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build -- Builds a project and all of its dependencies

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: SYNOPSIS

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: DESCRIPTION

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet build` command builds multiple source file from a source project and its dependencies into a binary.
trans-unit.target: The `dotnet build` command builds multiple source file from a source project and its dependencies into a binary.

trans-unit.source: The binary will be in Intermediate Language (IL) by default and will have a DLL extension.
trans-unit.target: The binary will be in Intermediate Language (IL) by default and will have a DLL extension.

trans-unit.source: will also drop a `\*.deps` file which outlines what the host needs to run the application.
trans-unit.target: will also drop a `\*.deps` file which outlines what the host needs to run the application.

trans-unit.source: Building requires the existence of a lock file, which means that you have to run [`dotnet restore`](dotnet-restore.md) prior to building your code.
trans-unit.target: Building requires the existence of a lock file, which means that you have to run [`dotnet restore`](dotnet-restore.md) prior to building your code.

trans-unit.source: Before any compilation begins, the build verb analyzes the project and its dependencies for incremental safety checks.
trans-unit.target: Before any compilation begins, the build verb analyzes the project and its dependencies for incremental safety checks.

trans-unit.source: If all checks pass, then build proceeds with incremental compilation of the project and its dependencies; otherwise, it falls back to non-incremental compilation.
trans-unit.target: If all checks pass, then build proceeds with incremental compilation of the project and its dependencies; otherwise, it falls back to non-incremental compilation.

trans-unit.source: Via a profile flag, users can choose to receive additional information on how they can improve their build times.
trans-unit.target: Via a profile flag, users can choose to receive additional information on how they can improve their build times.

trans-unit.source: All projects in the dependency graph that need compilation must pass the following safety checks in order for the compilation process to be incremental:
trans-unit.target: All projects in the dependency graph that need compilation must pass the following safety checks in order for the compilation process to be incremental:

trans-unit.source: not use pre/post compile scripts
trans-unit.target: not use pre/post compile scripts

trans-unit.source: not load compilation tools from PATH (for example, resgen, compilers)
trans-unit.target: not load compilation tools from PATH (for example, resgen, compilers)

trans-unit.source: use only known compilers (csc, vbc, fsc)
trans-unit.target: use only known compilers (csc, vbc, fsc)

trans-unit.source: In order to build an executable application, you need a special configuration section in your project.json file:
trans-unit.target: In order to build an executable application, you need a special configuration section in your project.json file:

trans-unit.source: OPTIONS
trans-unit.target: OPTIONS

trans-unit.source: , `--output` [DIR]
trans-unit.target: , `--output` [DIR]

trans-unit.source: Directory in which to place the built binaries.
trans-unit.target: Directory in which to place the built binaries.

trans-unit.source: , `--build-base-path` [DIR]
trans-unit.target: , `--build-base-path` [DIR]

trans-unit.source: Directory in which to place temporary outputs.
trans-unit.target: Directory in which to place temporary outputs.

trans-unit.source: , `--framework` [FRAMEWORK]
trans-unit.target: , `--framework` [FRAMEWORK]

trans-unit.source: Compiles for a specific framework.
trans-unit.target: Compiles for a specific framework.

trans-unit.source: The framework needs to be defined in the project.json file.
trans-unit.target: The framework needs to be defined in the project.json file.

trans-unit.source: , `--configuration` [Debug|Release]
trans-unit.target: , `--configuration` [Debug|Release]

trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration under which to build.
trans-unit.target: Defines a configuration under which to build.

trans-unit.source: If omitted, it defaults to Debug.
trans-unit.target: If omitted, it defaults to Debug.

trans-unit.source: , `--runtime` [RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER]
trans-unit.target: , `--runtime` [RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER]

trans-unit.source: Target runtime to build for.
trans-unit.target: Target runtime to build for.

trans-unit.source: [VERSION_SUFFIX]
trans-unit.target: [VERSION_SUFFIX]

trans-unit.source: Defines what `*` should be replaced with in the version field in the project.json file.
trans-unit.target: Defines what `*` should be replaced with in the version field in the project.json file.

trans-unit.source: The format follows NuGet's version guidelines.
trans-unit.target: The format follows NuGet's version guidelines.

trans-unit.source: Prints out the incremental safety checks that users need to address in order for incremental compilation to be automatically turned on.
trans-unit.target: Prints out the incremental safety checks that users need to address in order for incremental compilation to be automatically turned on.

trans-unit.source: Marks the build as unsafe for incremental build.
trans-unit.target: Marks the build as unsafe for incremental build.

trans-unit.source: This turns off incremental compilation and forces a clean rebuild of the project dependency graph.
trans-unit.target: This turns off incremental compilation and forces a clean rebuild of the project dependency graph.

trans-unit.source: Ignores project-to-project references and only builds the root project specified to build.
trans-unit.target: Ignores project-to-project references and only builds the root project specified to build.
